title: Overfitting
subtext: When a model learns too much from training data, harming new data performance.
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Overfitting
texts: Overfitting occurs when a machine learning model learns the details and noise in the training data to the extent that it negatively impacts its performance on new data.
It's like memorizing answers to a practice test without understanding the material, leading to poor performance on the actual exam.
